Our Menu

LunchDinnerFamily Take-Out Dinners

Everyday from 11am – 5pm, 4% service charge and gratuity for parties of 8 or more

Lunch Plates

Incudes two of the folowing: Slaw, Beans, Fries, Rings, Potato Salad, Cheesy Corn, or Macaroni and Cheese

Pork Spare Ribs

$17.95
4-5 pork ribs and two sides.

Sliced Beef Brisket

$18.95
Half pound of slow smoked beef brisket and two sides.

Pulled Pork

$15.95
Half Pound of slow smoked pulled pork and two sides.

1/2 Chicken Bone-In

$15.95
Add $2 for white meat only

Hot Links or Smoked Hot Dog

$13.95
Made for KCBBQ by Tarantino of San Diego, the official hot dog and sausage for the San Diego Padres!!

Burnt Ends (when available)

$18.95
The ends of the beef brisket, cubed up and smoked a little longer. When available

Combo

$19.95
Choice of two types of meat and two sides. Add $1 for baby backs, white meat chicken, or beef brisket.

Works

$22.95
Choice of three types of meat and two sides. Add $2 for baby backs, white meat chicken, or beef brisket.

Sampler for Four

$95.00
A generous sampling of KCBBQ's slow smoked meats, half slab Ribs, 1/2lb pulled pork, 1/2 lb beef brisket, 1/2 Chicken, 2 hot links. Choice of 4 large sides. Lots of food!

Sandwich Plates

Includes one of the following: Slaw, Beans, Fries, Rings, Potato Salad, Cheesy Corn, or Macaroni and Cheese. Add slaw for $0.75

Whole smoked Chicken, ribs by the slab, hand pulled pork and sliced brisket by the pound! Or try the Sampler for 4 (includes 4 pints of side dishes)! Check out the menu for the combinations.

Dinners to Go!

Includes 1 Pint Sauce & a Pint of 2 Side Dishes: Beans, Potato Salad, Mac & Cheese, Cheesy Corn, Cole Slaw

Whole Chicken (8 Pieces)

$25.00
Whole smoked chicken (8pieces) and 2 pints of sides. (sides:potato salad, mac n cheese, beans, slaw or cheesy corn).

Slab Ribs & Whole Chicken

$40.00
A full slab of ribs and a whole chicken, both smoked to perfection. Paired with 2 pints of our favorite side dishes. (sides:potato salad, mac n cheese, beans, slaw or cheesy corn)

Slab Ribs & 1 lb. Pulled Pork

$45.00
A full slab of ribs and a pound of hand pulled pork, both smoked to perfection. Paired with 2 pints of our favorite side dishes. (sides:potato salad, mac n cheese, beans, slaw or cheesy corn)

Slab Ribs & 1 lb. Brisket

$55.00
A full slab of ribs and a pound of sliced beef brisket, smoked to perfection. Paired with 2 pints of our favorite side dishes. (sides:potato salad, mac n cheese, beans, slaw or cheesy corn)

Sampler for 4

$75.00
Ribs, Brisket, Pork, Chicken, Hot Links plus 4 pints of side orders! (sides: potato salad, mac n cheese, beans, slaw or cheesy corn).
